<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/spaces/{space_id}/properties/{property_id}/tags/{tag_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a tag option for a given property id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
